ValidationRule.description: Rep can't mark Opp as "Order in Process" if: Account's Employee (MASTER) Status = "Unverified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(Bypass_Validation__c) && NOT(ISNEW()) && ISCHANGED(StageName) && ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Order in Process") && Account.Employees_MASTER_Status__c = "Unverified" && $Profile.Name <> "Apollo: Custom- Customer Services" && RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Renewal"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Opportunity can't be marked 'Order in Process' until the Account's 'Employees (MASTER)' value has been verified. Please Contact your manager or admin to verify.
